summary: Adds new exclusive perks to the Lycanthropy tree!
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1405761-overhauled-lycanthropy-project-new-perks][center][img]http://www.wendybrown-barry.com/images/Wolf.png[/img][/center][/url]

[center][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]============================ ENGLISH ============================[/b][/color][/center]

[b]Version:[/b] 1.2
[b]Author:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=972816]Sagittarius22[/url]
[b]Category:[/b] Gameplay
[b]Requirement:[/b] Latest Skyrim\'s patch & Dawnguard.
[b]Description:[/b] This mod adds new perk to the Lycanthropy perk tree. This is intended to be balanced and destined to make you enjoy being a werewolf while still becoming strong and powerful.

Current new perks/features (see screenshots for more details):

===== Seven new exclusive perks =====
*A special Sneak branch for real predators! See by yourself:
[youtube]v4tAlWWNEpU[/youtube]
Apprentice Predator 
Experienced Predator - requires the above perk
Fearsome Predator - requires the above perk
Patriarch Predator - requires the above perk

* Three perks to disarm your enemies:

Agile claws
Painful claws - requires the above perk
Bashing claws - requires the above perk

* Five perks to reduce the falling damage:
Solid Paws
Paws of Rock
Paws of Steel
Undestructible Paws
Godly Paws
[center]====================================================================================[/center]
[center][img]http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/upload/sagittarius22/sagittarius22_1330707422_Moorelf_1328629167_logo_sagittarius3.png[/img][/center]
[center]====================================================================================[/center]
author: Sagittarius22
